EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively - Tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> REMINDER: The Webinar You Registered for is Tomorrow
How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively
{{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} - this is your reminder for tomorrow's webinar.
Doug and Kelly look forward to an engaging discussion tomorrow (August 30) about effective strategies for improving crew documentation:
- implementing an effective chart review/QA process - designing creative training approaches - utilizing incentive and mentoring programs - making the most out of electronic documentation solutions - present real-world strategies to help solve this age-old problem
See you online tomorrow!
Please Note: Everyone who has registered will receive a link to the recording of tomorrow's webinar.
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communication Manager
800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com <mailto:cheri.lane@tritech.com> WEBINAR DETAILS JOIN LINK: {{member.webinar url:default=URL}}
ALTERNATE LOGIN: http://www.joinwebinar.com/fec/ <http://www.joinwebinar.com/fec/> Webinar ID: 327549839
CLICK TO DOWNLOAD HANDOUTS <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/Aug30_Handouts.pdf> DATE: Thursday August 30, 2012
TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT
SPEAKERS:
PRESENTER : Doug Wolfberg of Page, Wolfberg, and Wirth
MODERATOR: Kelly Wachal - TriTech Supervisor of Customer Service and Education
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800-263-6317 to reach the GoToWebinar Support Team
